text: (2:5) I looked again, and there was a man with a measuring line in his hand.

I <st data-num="0559" class="">asked</st>, “<st data-num="0575" class="">Where</st> are <st data-num="0859" class="">you</st> <st data-num="01980" class="">going</st>?” He <st data-num="0559 0413">replied</st>, “To <st data-num="04058" class="">measure</st> <st data-num="03389" class="">Jerusalem</st><n id="1" /> in order to <st data-num="07200" class="">determine</st> its <st data-num="04100 07341">width</st> and its <st data-num="04100 0753">length</st>.”

<st data-num="02009" class="">At this point</st> the <st data-num="04397" class="">angelic messenger</st><n id="1" /> who <st data-num="01696" class="">spoke</st> to me <st data-num="03318" class="">went out</st>, and <st data-num="0312" class="">another</st> <st data-num="04397" class="">messenger</st> <st data-num="03318" class="">came</st> to <st data-num="07125" class="">meet</st> him

and <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> him, “<st data-num="07323" class="">Hurry</st>, <st data-num="01696" class="">speak</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> <st data-num="01975" class="">this</st> <st data-num="05288" class="">young man</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="0559" class="">as follows</st>: ‘<st data-num="03389" class="">Jerusalem</st> will <st data-num="06519" class="">no longer</st> <st data-num="03427" class="">be</st> <st data-num="06519" class="">enclosed by walls</st><n id="2" /> because of the <st data-num="07230" class="">multitude</st> of <st data-num="0120" class="">people</st> and <st data-num="0929" class="">animals</st> <st data-num="08432" class="">there</st>.
But I,’ the Lord says, ‘will be a wall of fire surrounding Jerusalem and the source of glory in her midst.’”
“You there! Flee from the northland!” says the Lord, “for like the four winds of heaven I have scattered you,” says the Lord.
“<st data-num="01945 04422">Escape</st>, <st data-num="06726" class="">Zion</st>, you who <st data-num="03427" class="">live</st> among the <st data-num="01323 0894">Babylonians</st>!”<n id="1" />
For the Lord of Heaven’s Armies says: “For his own glory he has sent me to the nations that plundered you—for anyone who touches you touches the pupil of his eye.
Yes, look here, I am about to punish them so that they will be looted by their own slaves.” Then you will know that the Lord of Heaven’s Armies has sent me.
“Sing out and be happy, Zion my daughter! For look, I have come; I will settle in your midst,” says the Lord.

“Many nations will join themselves to the Lord on the day of salvation, and they will also be my people. Indeed, I will settle in the midst of you all. Then you will know that the Lord of Heaven’s Armies has sent me to you.
The Lord will take possession of Judah as his portion in the holy land and he will choose Jerusalem once again.
Be silent in the Lord’s presence, all people everywhere, for he is being moved to action in his holy dwelling place.”
